attributes.action: Abolishment of car parking charges at Hospitals
attributes.additional_details:
The government should abolish car parking charges and fines at Hospitals. Exceptions for car parking ticket requirements are for stays which only last for 20 minutes, which is too short a period of time.

Hospitals should not have the right to charge people to park there, whether visiting a friend or relative or through admission.

Fines should also be abolished for those who do park and do not display a valid ticket at a hospital.

Going to a Hospital is not a privilege or an enjoyment, and the government should not be allowed to allow people to have to pay to visit a hospital.
